body.p: Notwithstanding the boards’ decision that only contracts with customers should be accounted for under IFRS 15, the boards also decided that some of the requirements in IFRS 15 should apply to the transfer of non-financial assets that are not an output of an entity’s ordinary activities (see paragraphs BC494–BC503).
